title: Why are duos always so toxic?

replies.body: why are duos always so bad

There are 2 types of duo's. The type that just wants to help each other climb together, and don't usually rage unless the team itself isn't listening to them (they have 2 points of view with communication). The believe because of this they should be making the team calls and when the team doesn't listen and %%%% hits the fan.. que toxic. The other type are usually full out troll doing stupid stuff. If they actually get ahead they will proberly go ahead and get the win. But don't expect them to help when behind. They'll point out any mistakes anyone else makes but will continue to make that mistake themselves. They will always blame the jungler, taking the kill, not ganking or just being bad.

* Listen to your duo when they are trying, or mute them for doing stupid %%%% and try carry them.
